alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:17PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson County through 445 PM PDT... At 417 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Camp Sherman, or 21 miles west of Madras, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Warm Springs Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
